resources.string: Daniel Fox is a graduate student at Pace University studying Computer Science. Daniel lives with his wife in Brooklyn, New York. Prior to studying at Pace University, Daniel worked in baseball operations for the New York Mets. Daniel is originally from Queens, New York and studied at St. Josephs College for his undergraduate degree and NYU for his masters degree in Sports Business.
My hobbies include coding, fantasy sports, playing video games, and listening to podcasts and audio books.
